content.text:
# Warmingia

Warmingia is a genus of orchids. It includes four species from the tropical Americas, native to Costa Rica, Colombia and Ecuador, and northeastern Brazil to Bolivia and northeastern Argentina.
Species
Four species are accepted.
*Warmingia buchtienii  – Bolivia
*Warmingia eugenii  – eastern and southern Brazil, Paraguay, and northeastern Argentina (Misiones Province)
*Warmingia holopetala  – southeastern Brazil (Minas Gerais)
*Warmingia zamorana  – Costa Rica, northwestern Colombia, and Ecuador
